name: Dial, Aah Monster
description:
How to Play

Dial your cute monster and play games with it.

Select games with the on screen controls or use the number row/pad to play.

There is no ending, just keep playing with your monster until you get bored of
them.

Created for the "LCD" Dogpit Jam, 2019
